column5: Not only is he a good friend, skilled angler and top notch mechanic but he's one H E L L of a great person. I had to drive from Lindsay to Whitby and back today to take my kids back to my ex's place (130 KM round trip).  I did the breaks yesterday to discover the drivers rear caliper is going...  Well by time I got to Port Perry I could feel it going badly...  Pulled over and sure as can be it was!  I had to get the kids home and the ex was not willing to meet me where I was (so I was not to cause too much more damage to my Ram and my kids safety) I had to drive on to Whitby...  I made the call to ecmilley to ask where to grab a part (on a SUNDAY no less!!!) and he said he had one for his own truck.  So I limp the truck home as best I could...  Not only did he come and deliver the caliper (brand new and not a refurb!) he had at home for his truck but he did the install too!  We were done and ready in no time too! Now I have to get him one in return is all. So when those that don't know him as I and others do and read his posts about anything mechanical trust me when I say the following.  He DOES KNOW HIS STUFF and ISN'T a web surfer for the answer! SOLID FRIEND and Mechanic!  Thanks again bud!!!
Good on him! Always nice to have good feiends.
Awesome! Sometime it pays to be part of something bigger then ones self!

Awesome! Sometime it pays to be part of something bigger then ones self! I always have been G as you know.  It's the bigger picture than the now is how I have always looked and will still look at things.
Yup ec is a good dood fer sher!
See what happens when you live close to Big Cliff...some of him rubs off...LOL  Good on you Ernie...
No doubt about it, EC is a solid guy, he's often done right by me also!
That's great!  Way to be EC!  Another reason to love this site!
